abort.missing_capabilities: The MCP server does not support a required capability (Tools)
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorisation error while obtaining access token.
abort.reauth_account_mismatch: The authenticated user does not match the MCP Server user that needed re-authentication.

error.invalid_url: Must be a valid MCP server URL

credentials_choice.description: You can either use existing credentials from another integration or set up new credentials.

menu_option_descriptions.new_credentials: You will be guided through setting up a new OAuth Client ID and secret.
menu_option_descriptions.pick_implementation: You may use previously entered OAuth credentials.

credentials_choice.title: Choose how to authenticate with the MCP server

data_description.implementation: The credentials you want to use to authenticate.

data_description.url: The remote MCP server URL for the SSE endpoint, for example {example_url}
